folder: Romer Road & Four Corners Road, Staten Island, NY
original_title: Richmond: Romer Road - Four Corners Road
text:
R

Romer Road, between Four Corners Road and St. George
Road, showing the Bowering residence.

1925

P. L. Sperr

folder: Romer Road & Four Corners Road, Staten Island, NY
original_title: Richmond: Romer Road - Four Corners Road
text:
Romer Road (vantage-point), west side, between Four Corners and St. George Roads, showing the"Romer House". F. L. Sperr states that it is the residence of Comptroller Berry. In 1874 it was on the property of S. Wann, and later (1898-1907) on that of George Cromwell. The driveway shown is the private road leading up to the house from Romer Road.

July 1927.

F. L. Sperr.
